segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the puddle at her feet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin everything if she doesn't do something soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like the whole kitchen is going to be flooded if she doesn't turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet, but they're making a mess of their own.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be really upset when she finally notices the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just going to keep pouring out, and she's not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this kind of waste and mess, it's so unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's going on before it's too late and everything is ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR
